name: Zombiepunk 2077
description:
Kill all zombies and make your way to the escape pod

WASD - to move
Left mouse button - to shoot
Right mouse button - to throw grenades
Space - to restart level after death

Game made solo from scratch in 2 weeks for Gaijin Jam 2021
Written in c++ using SDL2, bgfx, bullet physics, assimp, yaml-cpp and mathfu.
Using Polygon Sci-Fi city pack
